title: "I Agree" Verification Won't Work
body: Okay, I was playing in the middle of the game and my computer went off all of a sudden. I realized that the battery is drained so I charged it. When I got back to log myself back in and get back into action, there was a warning saying that there's a penalty for leaving the game and I need to type in "I agree" to continue. I did and the OK button doesn't work. What is going on? What should I do?

replies.body: Might be a disconnect so your response can't be received by the server.  What happens if you relog?
Do I have to report this to the Help and Support to get the problem fixed?

Sorry for the delay in responding back to you.  Your issue sounds pretty unusual!  In this case, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this with you to see what's going on.  We'll see you there!
I did that and it still doesn't work.
